page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: 7.30 I HAVE BREAKFAST 7.45 I HAVE A WASH AND GET DRESSED 7.55 I BRUSH MY HAIR AND MAKE SURE I/VE GOT MY HOMEWORK. 8.05 I SIT DOWN AND WATCH T.V 8.45 I SET OFF FOR SCHOOL. WHEN I ARRIVE WE SAY PRAYERS THEN WE START S.M.P OR 9 ADAY. 10.30 WE ALL GO OUT TO PLAY.11.00 WE ALL COME IN AND START S.M.P UNTIL 12.00 THEN WE ALL GO TO DINNER. THEN AT 12.30 WE ALL GO OUT TO PLAY UNTIL 1.00 THEN WE COME IN AND START LANGUAGE PATTERNS UNTIL 2.30 THEN WE ALL GO OUT TO PLAY UNTIL 3.00 THEN WE COME IN AND START TOPIC CARDS UNTIL 3.30 THEN WE ALL GO HOME. WHEN I GET HOME I START MY HOMEWORK.THEN AT 4.00 I GO OUT TO PLAY . AT 5.15 I COME IN AND HAVE MY TEA.WHEN I HAVE FINISHED MY TEA I WATCH T.V .THEN AT 8.30 I GO AND GET READY FOR BED THEN AT 9.45 I GO TO BED.
